item.title: American launches new AAdvantage Pass for $5,000 with intriguing possibilities for status and bonus miles
item.description: AA is selling a new status pass that can get you 100,000 bonus miles and other benefits.

item.title: A guide to guest policies for airport lounges
item.description: Because each airport lounge has its own guest policies, here's everything you need to know about bringing guests along into the lounge with you before...

item.title: Cathay Pacific's swanky Aria Suite will make its big US debut next month
item.description: Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific will debut its fancy Aria Suite on U.S. flights from San Francisco beginning in January.

item.title: Grand Canyon National Park is closing all South Rim hotels temporarily
item.description: Hotels on the Grand Canyon National Park’s South Rim will close Dec. 6 following “significant breaks” in the Transcanyon Waterline.

item.title: Act now: Capital One will devalue transfers to Emirates Skywards next month
item.description: Capital One miles will transfer to Emirates Skywards at a ratio of 2:1.5 from Jan. 13, 2026. Move miles before then to lock in the current 1:1 ratio.
